name: MPSKernel
desc: A standard interface for Metal Performance Shaders kernels.

items.name: func copy(with: NSZone?, device: MTLDevice?) -> Self
items.desc: Makes a copy of this kernel object for a new device.

items.name: var options: MPSKernelOptions
items.desc: The set of options used to run the kernel.

items.name: struct MPSKernelOptions
items.desc: The options used when creating a kernel.

items.name: var device: MTLDevice
items.desc: The device on which the kernel will be used.

items.name: var label: String?
items.desc: The string that identifies the kernel.
